name: Invalid OTP - Verify MFA code, MFA backup code, Email or SMS OTP
fullName: QA|Nova Bank - Infopool/Bank User/v1/Auth/MFA/Verify#Invalid OTP - Verify MFA code, MFA backup code, Email or SMS OTP
description:
Verify TOTP or OTP. For OTP, you need to provide either `email` or `phone` as the recipient if you are not logged in.
    Make sure the operation matches the one used to generate the OTP.

    `operation` can be one of: 
- LOGIN
- FORGOT_PASSWORD
- CREATE_ROLE
- UPDATE_ROLE
- DELETE_ROLE
descriptionHtml:
Verify TOTP or OTP. For OTP, you need to provide either `email` or `phone` as the recipient if you are not logged in.
Make sure the operation matches the one used to generate the OTP.

`operation` can be one of:
- LOGIN
- FORGOT_PASSWORD
- CREATE_ROLE
- UPDATE_ROLE
- DELETE_ROLE
statusMessage: Status code is 400, Reponse body contains standard Error fields
